column6: at least 160 people were poisoned by food at a funeral in the village.------Dr Oung Rattana
column7: director of the provincial health department of Ratanakkiri province
column8: said he had sent doctors to the scene immediately to save the people.------The cause was badly prepared food. However
column9: the people are expected to all make full recoveries
column10: with the team standing by to check out and follow up their health until they get better.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/270749------
